title: During mainnet sync, `UnsupportedAddressTypeException`
body:
### Description

Uncaught `UnsupportedAddressTypeException` exception during initial mainnet sync. Besu 20.10.4 using official docker image, on Ubuntu 20.04. Sync continued after this and finished successfully.

```
eth1_1    | 2021-02-01 23:39:42.596+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-28 (importBlock) | INFO  | FullImportBlockStep | Import reached block 11768400 (0xea0b..ea9f), 3.309 Mg/s, Peers: 26
eth1_1    | 2021-02-01 23:40:20.513+00:00 | vert.x-eventloop-thread-2 | WARN  | PeerDiscoveryAgent | Sending to peer DiscoveryPeer{status=bonding, enode=enode://278d4cdbd0e662ece62d635d8b641387f5d176fd219974add0b6fd683efa3430cae4db6f5adc5b32a3a96eeaddc527577198dc6ca184ab2fade4f8093016be2d@[90ac:9f5d:6b7f:0:1000::]:6862, firstDiscovered=1612222820495, lastContacted=0, lastSeen=0} failed, packet:
```
